data.actual_result: Photo no longer has transparent background, the background is now white.
data.expected_result: Photo has transparent in the background when uploaded.
data.short_description: Photo loses Transparency when saving on Discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a photo with a transparent background. - Upload it onto Discord. - Click on it. - Click on the three dots. - Click Save Content. - Upload the photo you just saved. - Observe.
